Author: notracisthasblackcat
Text: I've seen my UGW (within <1lb) on the scale before and it didn't even register. I just know it will always go back up and I'll have to live a nightmare to maintain it. It doesn't even matter anymore. Sometimes I feel like this ED is just to keep my mind occupied.

Author: Rivka90
Text: Woah, this resonates . I hit a new low 8days ago and then bam, I ate all the food. All of it. Spent all my money I'd been saving to buy a laptop on stupid fucking food. And I couldn't even eat it all, either, because my stomach had shrunk and my eyes were bigger than it was. I'm back on as of yesterday, but damn. That UGW hits differently.
